title: New Kidney Donation Guidelines Begin To Pay Off
teaser: Joanna Richards of WCPN catches up with 31-year-old Mike Brown, who recently got a kidney transplant.
contentencoded:
Back in January, we profiled Mike Brown, a 31-year-old from Euclid, Ohio waiting for a kidney transplant. Brown was hoping to get a new kidney much faster after an overhaul of the national waiting-list policies. Well, Brown got his kidney, and Joanna Richards from Here & Now contributor WCPN recently caught up with him.
